PROJECT DETAILS   (IRIS Software, Noida) 

 
 

Project# 1 

 

Project Name :     LAC-Lights-ON 

 

Lord Abbett is an US based Investment Bank, which provides Mutual Fund Investment strategy 

products. Lights-On handles Production support related to reporting and enhancement/changes 

on Products of LAC. 

 
Roles and Responsibilities 
 
1. Discuss and gather requirements from business counterparts for new 

implementations. 

 

2. Writing ETL loaders for DB to DB load and filtering and cleaning of data to be 
loaded 

 

3. Creation, modification, controlling and scheduling jobs in Zeke/CHARM as per the 

requirement jobs. 



 

4.  Developing new scripts and writing SQL for fetching reports on SQL Server/Oracle. 

 

5. Handle Change requests raised by business and test mappings, workflows for any 

Change. 

 

6. Involve in performance tuning of queries and scripts used to load/fetch the data. 

 

7. Handling Partners calls and Needs. 
 
8. Responsible for handling production issues of various application of LAC related to 

report generation and tidal job failures.  
9. Monitoring VRS workflows, ad-hoc report generation, report validation for data and 

formatting issues. 
10. Performing month/quarter end activities of generating reports on VRS, data 

extracts etc. 
11. Also involved in automation/enhancement of the applications to avoid repetitive 

failures. 

 

 

PROJECT DETAILS   (Sunlife Financials) 

 
 

Project# 1 

 

Project Name :         ICAS Investment 

 

Working as a part of Investment and Corporate Application Services (ICAS) 

team developing and creating new ETL jobs, maintenance support and 

monitoring of existing ETL jobs, DB extraction/loading and workflow scheduling. 

 

Roles and Responsibilities 

 

1) Discuss and gather requirements from business counterparts for new 

implementations. 

2) Writing ETL loaders for DB to DB load and filtering and cleaning of data to be 

loaded 

3) Creation, modification, controlling and scheduling jobs in Zeke/CHARM as 

per the requirement jobs. 

4) Developing new scripts and writing SQL for fetching reports on SQL 

Server/Oracle. 

5) Monitoring and Maintaining Zeke production jobs and fixing in case of issues. 

Handle Change requests raised by business and test mappings, workflows for 

any Change. 

6) Involve in performance tuning of queries and scripts used to load/fetch the 

data. 

7) Handling Partners calls and Needs. 

8) Sunnovation and implement ideas for automation. 



 

 

 
 

 

PROJECT DETAILS   (NIIT Technologies) 

 

Project# 1 

Project Name :         AMLIN (NITL) 

 

We have developed a product Subscribe of Insurance Domain which provides an 

interface to user to create Policies, Reinsurance, Claims and Premium. 

 

Role: SQL Developer (MSBI) 

1) Requirement gathering from end user and understand the data. 

2) Developed Procedures, Functions, views and triggers. 

3) To Write Sub queries, SQL queries and joins. 

4) To create packages in SSIS. 

5) Created IT Plan document to plan the testing activities. 

6) Deploy the build in Dev. environment. 

7) Performed Functional, Regression and Integration Testing. 

8) Analyze the requirement and prepare the Impact Assessment document. 

 

Project# 2 

Project Name: ASCOT (NITL) 

 

Different version of Subscribe a product developed for Insurance Domain which 

Provides an interface to user to create Policies, Claims and Premium. 

 

Role: SQL Developer 

1) Requirement gathering from end user and understand the data. 

2) Developed Procedures, Functions, views and triggers. 

3) Creating indexing, Tables and Schemas for New DB 

4) To Write Sub queries, SQL queries and joins. 

5) To create packages in SSIS. 

Project# 3 

Project Name: Canopius (NITL) 

 

Different version of Subscribe a product developed for Insurance Domain which 

Provides an interface to user to create Policies, Claims and Premium. 

 

Role: SQL Developer 

 

1) Requirement gathering from end user and understand the data. 

2) Working on SQL Store procedure/Function programming, views, Triggers and 

Index 



3) Able to identify the root cause of the issues reported by the client and able to 

4) Resolve them effectively.

Liaise with other departments in the organization to close pending issues.

Monitoring health and alerts of services.

Analyzing logs to understand the issues, and work towards resolving them.
Facilitating discussion, decision making, and conflict resolution.

Report on common sources of technical issues or questions and make recommendations to product team.
